ModMetaData.name: Rimano: Architect Icons
ModMetaData.author: Deadmano
ModMetaData.description:
Rimano specific icons in HD for the Architect Icons mod.
Provides much more crisp and detailed icons for every tab the Rimano collection uses, as well as for some other popular mod-added ones.
Safe to add or remove at any time, and can be used without the Rimano collection if you'd just prefer the HD architect icons.
Requires the Architect Icons mod and should be loaded after it. This is simply a texture replacement for the icons.
